import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {NgForm} from "@angular/forms"; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; import {User} from "../models/user"; import {NgbDateStruct} from "@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap"; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit{ authUser: User | any; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } ngOnInit(): void { let id = this.authService.getAuthUser(); this.authService.getById(id).subscribe((response: any) => { response.json().then((data : any) => { console.log(data) this.authUser = data });}); } }
